mapper.sql: tsu.id, tsu.account, tsu.`password`, tsu.`name`, tsu.phone, tsu.email, tsu.creator, tsu.create_time as createTime, tsu.`status`
mapper.select: select tsu.id,tsu.`name` from tb_sys_user_group tsug join tb_sys_user tsu on tsug.user_id = tsu.id where tsug.group_id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and tsug.`status` = '1' and tsu.`status` = '1'
select tsu.`name` from tb_sys_user_group tsug join tb_sys_user tsu on tsug.user_id = tsu.id where tsug.group_id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and tsug.`status` = '1' and tsu.`status` = '1'

select t.id, t.`name` from tb_sys_user t left join (select t1.id , t1.name from tb_sys_user t1, tb_sys_user_group t2 where t2.`status` = '1' and t1.`status` = '1' and t1.id = t2.user_id and t2.group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) tt on t.id = tt.id where tt.id is null and t.`status` = '1'
and t.`name` like CONCAT('%', #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
ORDER BY t.create_time DESC, t.id DESC

select DISTINCT t.id as groupId, t.group_name as groupName, t.create_time as createTime, t.`status` from tb_sys_group t left join (SELECT t1.id,t1.group_name FROM tb_sys_group t1 , tb_sys_user_group t2 where t1.id = t2.group_id and t1.`status` = '1' and t2.`status` = '1' and t2.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) tt on t.id = tt.id where tt.id is null and t.`status` = '1'
and t.group_name like CONCAT('%', #{userGroupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
